stanza.line: In faith I do not love thee with mineeyes
For they in thee a thousand errorsnote
But tis my heart that loves what theydespise
Who in despite of view is pleased todote
Nor are mine cars with thy tongue tunedelighted
Nor tender feeling to base touchesprone
Nor taste nor smell desire to beinvited
To any sensual feast with theealone
But my five wits nor my five sensescan
Dissuade one foolish heart from servingthee
Who leaves unswayed the likeness of aman
Thy proud heart slave and vassal wretch tobe
Only my plague thus far I count mygain
That she that makes me sin awards mepain
